name: Survivor Sledge-Fu
description: You have started to become truly proficient in handling heavy weaponry. Sledge-Fu allows you to bully an opponent using your strength until the right moment presents itself to swing your weapon properly for a killing blow.
initiate: You roll your neck and get ready to shatter your enemies.

static_buffs.name: Intimidating Figure
static_buffs.description:
No man, machine or monstrosity can get through you and your strength. 

+2 Block attempts, -3.0 Dodge skill, blocked damage reduced by 70%% of Strength.

onmove_buffs.name: Moving Bulk
onmove_buffs.description:
Moving your weight around makes it hard to take hits strategically, but it does prove useful for extra swing speed. 

-2 Block attempts, blocked damage increased by 70%% of Strength.
+10%% bonus to bashing damage.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmiss_buffs.name: Swinging Big
onmiss_buffs.description:
That's it! Now direct it towards them! 

+20%% bonus to bashing damage.
Enables "Flying Blow" technique.
Enables "Violent Shove" technique.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 3 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Tiring Control
onattack_buffs.description:
Directing your enemy with your strikes proves useful to make them predictable, but you grow inefficient with every new move. Take a break. 

+1 Block attempt.
+15%% movecost.
Lasts 2 turns. Stacks 3 times.

onblock_buffs.name: Riled Up
onblock_buffs.description:
Like a little fly, buzzing around harmlessly... 

+10%% bonus to bashing damage.
-10%% movecost.
Enables "Violent Shove" technique.
Lasts 1 turn.  Stacks 3 times.

ondodge_buffs.name: Eager For Contact
ondodge_buffs.description:
You dodged. Next time, you'll take the hit and make them pay properly. 

-3.0 Dodge skill
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.
